results.p: An Esports gaming mouse featuring ultra-lightweight design, Razer™ Optical Mouse Switches Gen-3, and the Razer™ HyperSpeed Wireless connection.
A professional 2D barcode scan engine can scan barcodes in all directions, even when the barcode is damaged, scratched or stained.
results.t: Ultra-lightweight Wireless Mouse for Gaming - Razer Viper V2 Pro
